candidate Profile Description.summary: Bargav Jagatha is a Data Scientist with experience in AI-driven model architecture, ETL pipeline design, and advanced deep learning techniques. Skilled in Python, C++, Java, Scala, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Scikit-Learn, OpenCV, Numpy, Pandas, SQL, ETL, PySpark, BeautifulSoup, AWS, Azure, Git, Docker, OOP, MLOps, Computer Vision, U-Net, HuggingFace, Large Language Models, and REST APIs. Adept in Data Science & Analysis, Deep Learning, Linear Algebra, Natural Language Processing, Reinforcement Learning, and Statistics.

education.degree: Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science and Engineering

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
experience.description: Lead Teaching Assistant for the graduate-level Data Engineering at Scale course, covering Database Design, ETL/ELT, Distributed Systems, Docker, Azure, and BI strategies.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: Architected AI-driven models for cab pricing and driver-customer allocation, boosting GMV by 6%. Developed LSTM-based proximity unlock model for EVs with a 97% accuracy rate.

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Engineered a RASA-based customer support chatbot with a 96% accuracy rate post-intent detection. Designed a multi-label text classification system for VoC tagging with a weighted F1 score above 70%.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Executed a solo project within the Edge AI team, devising a database solution using Android Java and SQLite for smart home security clips.

projects.title: Cancer Type Classifier
projects.description: Leveraged RESNET50 to accurately classify cancer types from high-resolution WSI histopathology images.

projects.title: Multi-Object Tracking and Data Association
projects.description: Enhanced multi-object tracking and data association by employing Kalman Filter and Hungarian Algorithm to accurately track multiple cars within a scene.

projects.title: 3D Pose Estimation
projects.description: Engaged in a project aimed at optimizing physical exercises using 3D Pose estimation from a monocular view, focusing on real-time posture analysis and improvement.

fellowships.title: AWS AI & ML Advanced Nanodegree Scholarship Program 2023
fellowships.description: Excelled in the AWS Advanced AI & ML    Scholarship, developing an image classifier for roadway footage analysis using SageMaker, and secured a gold badge for mastering the full ML workflow.

fellowships.title: Microsoft MARS Colonization Program 2020
fellowships.description: Developed an AI-driven Tic Tac Toe web game for a team innovation challenge.

others.title: iNeuron AI/ML Hackathon winner
others.description: Orchestrated the design and deployment of an advanced RASA chatbot for iNeuron, securing first place and a $2,500 prize. The project involved crafting conversational AI, focusing on its seamless integration and functionality.
